content_to_avoid.Description: Content promoting non-binary concepts, transgender transitions for minors, or critiques of biological sex norms
Material undermining traditional motherhood, promoting abortion access, or framing marriage as oppressive
Content denying divine moral authority or promoting atheism as superior to religious faith
Normalization of casual sex, LGBTQ+ relationships in children's content, or critiques of chastity
Content attacking American founding principles, promoting critical race theory, or socialist economic models
